name: Temple of Seasons (Demo Edition)
description:
Temple of Seasons is a 2D puzzle game where the player can only solve each puzzle by altering the environment around them via a season change mechanic.

Your goal is to help Sol (The character you will be playing as) solve puzzles through out the temple. As stated before, the only way you can do this is to use Sol's seemingly unnatural power to control the environment through changing the four seasons; Spring, Summer, Autumn and Winter.

This is indeed a demo version, this game is still a work in progress and will have more content released in the future. At the moment you can only play with a PS4 Controller for this game. There are Keyboard commands also but those are just to make sure the game works.

This version was made as my thesis project for my graduate program at LIU Post for Game Design.
